[File: third_party/move/move-compiler-v2/legacy-move-compiler/src/lib.rs] [Cross-Module] [State Consistency] Do the modules (parser, expansion, verification, ir_translation) properly maintain consistent state when passed between compilation stages, or could state corruption lead to bytecode that violates Move invariants?
